name: Stadium Stock Exchange
tag_list: sports, fantasy-sports, fantasy, fantasy-football, trading, stocks, stock-market, investing
overview:
Stadium Stock Exchange is a fantasy sports platform that combines people’s enthusiasm for college sports with stock market-style investing to create a viable college fantasy sports game.

Stadium Stock Exchange (SSE) focuses on buying and selling teams in a stock market. Users will build a portfolio of teams (stocks). After the initial release of stock (IPO), the market will operate just as the NYSE does; user demand for buying and selling teams will affect their prices throughout the course of the season. As more users buy a team, that stock price goes up. As more users sell a team, that stock price goes down. This format will engage players in a way that keeps the game fun throughout the season and captures the essential aspects that make people love college football.
